page.title: 12TREVISSOME NURSERIES
page.content: Trevissome Nurseries comprise of 13.5 acres ,.5 of an acre is made up of glass and polythene greenhouses,and 13 acres of outdoor land. Altogether,3000 plants are grown in the greenhouses. They grow early and late tomatoes, cucumbers, lettuces grown indoors and out, bedding plants, pot plants, and outdoor strawberries. The tomatoes are grown in ring culture, and the cucumbers are grown in grow bags. There are 11 greenhouses and the plants inside them are watered twice each day. The water supply is semi_ automatic and all the greenhouses are diesel heated. The diesel costs Â£440 for 2200 litres. The polythene sheets on the greenhouses are replaced every two years and each sheet costs Â£80.
